member.name: T:CptS321.Spreadsheet
member.summary: Factory for the SpreadsheetCell class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: E:CptS321.Spreadsheet.CellPropertyChanged
member.summary: This event triggers when any Cell in the 2-dimensional array is modified.

member.name: P:CptS321.Spreadsheet.RowCount
member.summary: Gets the height of the spreadsheet.

member.name: P:CptS321.Spreadsheet.ColumnCount
member.summary: Gets the width of the spreadsheet.

member.name: M:CptS321.Spreadsheet.GetCell(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Accesses a cell.
member.param: The row of the cell one wants to access.
The column of the cell one wants to access.
member.returns: Returns the cell at location (rowIndex, columnIndex) or null if such a cell does not exist.

member.name: M:CptS321.Spreadsheet.UpdateSpreadsheet(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Triggers CellPropertyChanged and is called whenever a single cell in spreadSheet has its text field changed.
member.param: The name of the property that was used for the change.

member.name: T:CptS321.Spreadsheet.Cell
member.summary: Acts the same as a SpreadsheetCell, but can be initiated only inside of Spreadsheet.

member.name: M:CptS321.Spreadsheet.Cell.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Provides access to the constructor of SpreadsheetCell.
member.param: The current row number of this cell.
The current column number of this cell.

member.name: P:CptS321.Spreadsheet.Cell.Value
member.summary: Gets or Sets the value of a cell.

member.name: T:CptS321.SpreadsheetCell
member.summary: Class that provides the functionality of a single cell in the spreadsheet.

member.name: F:CptS321.SpreadsheetCell.text
member.summary: The string of the cell that can be seen in the GUI.

member.name: F:CptS321.SpreadsheetCell.value
member.summary: The calculated value of the cell in the GUI.

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetCell.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetCell.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructor that allows creation of a SpreadsheetCell with a given rowIndex and columnIndex.
member.param: Initialize field rowIndex with parameter rowIndex.
Initialize field columnIndex with paremeter columnIndex.

member.name: E:CptS321.SpreadsheetCell.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Triggers when any of the properties are changed, argument sent is the name of the property.
